snippet: Erika Murray, the 31-year-old woman who the authorities believe is the mother of the children, has been ordered held without bail.
abstract: Police in Blackstone, Mass, find three dead infants hidden inside house of Erika Murray, as well as piles of soiled diapers and the skeletons of several cats and a dog; four other children are removed from home and Murray, who authorities believe is mother of all seven children, is ordered held without bail on charges of permitting substantial injury to a child and witness intimidation.
lead_paragraph: Erika Murray, the 31-year-old woman who the authorities believe is the mother of the children, has been ordered held without bail.

headline.main: Massachusetts Town Shudders After Discovery of Dead Infants
headline.print_headline: Town in Massachusetts Shudders After Discovery of Dead Infants in House
